product_title: ECOVACS DEEBOT X11 OmniCyclone Robot Vacuum and Mop, PowerBoost Charging, OZMO Roller 2.0 Instant Self-Washing Mop, 19,500Pa Suction, Bagless OmniCyclone Station, AIVI 3D Smart Navigation
about_product: Fast Top-Ups, Nonstop Clean – No More Downtime - Tired of robots dying mid-cleaning? Powered by industry-first PowerBoost charging, X11 restores 6% battery in just 3 minutes during mop washing. Cleans large homes continuously, even at full settings

Edge-to-Edge, Streak-Free Mopping – DEEBOT X11’s OZMO ROLLER 2.0 uses a high-density nylon roller to scrub stubborn stains without streaking. TruEdge 3.0 extends deep into edges and hard-to-reach areas for complete mopping coverage

High Airflow, Strong Suction, Ultimate Vacuum – BLAST technology delivers 38 CFM airflow and 19,500Pa suction, offering 262% better carpet hair pickup than X9 PRO. ZeroTangle 3.0 reduces hair tangling to nearly 0%—ideal for pets and high-traffic homes

Bagless, Effortless, Greener – X11 debuts ECOVACS’ first bagless auto-emptying OMNI station, cutting dust bag waste. It adds 167°F hot water soak washing and dual-solution cleaning for deeper, smarter mopping.Enjoy fully automated deep cleaning

TruePass 4-Wheel Climbing – DEEBOT X11’s TruePass system uses mechanical lever wheels to smoothly climb over thresholds, tracks, and floor transitions up to 0.9” high and 1.6” wide—no AI or pre-scan needed. Enjoy uninterrupted whole-home cleaning

Smart Wet & Dry Clean – Triple Lift System – No manual intervention needed—X11 auto-lifts the mop on carpets, raises side brushes for large debris, and adjusts the main brush to prevent spills across all floor types

Hot Water Soak Wash + Dual Clean Solutions – Deeper Clean, Healthier Home – 167°F hot water deeply cleans floors. Dual solutions switch between daily and deep cleaning modes for targeted, hygienic results.(Note: Cleaning Solution needs to be purchased separately)
AI-Powered Smart Navigation – Efficient & Precise Cleaning – AIVI 3D 3.0 and LiDAR help avoid obstacles, detect dirt, and clean thoroughly without missing spots or getting stuck

Compact, All-in-One Base – Effortless, Maintenance-Free Cleaning – The station auto-refills, hot-washes, dispenses solution, self-cleans, and dries with 145°F hot air—all in a compact design for total convenience

Voice & App Control – Cleaning Made Easy-Control DEEBOT X11 with your voice via Alexa or Google Assistant, or use the app for remote cleaning commands. Enjoy effortless cleaning through smart voice controls—whether you’re home or away

product_information.Special Feature: BLAST Suction 19,500Pa, Bagless Auto-Empty (PureCyclone 2.0), OZMO ROLLER 2.0, PowerBoost Charging, TrueEdge 3.0, ZeroTangle™ 3.0 – Anti-Hair Wrap Brush

customers_say: Customers find the robotic vacuum cleaner effective at cleaning homes and appreciate its incredible suction power. The device is smart, with one customer highlighting its AIVI 3D navigation system, and they like its customization features, with one noting it can adjust automatically between different floor types. They praise its ease of use, quick battery recharging, and its ability to navigate around furniture like a pro.

top_reviews.review_title: Smart robot  with lots of features
top_reviews.review_comment: The media could not be loaded. I’m really happy with this robot vacuum and mop so far! First off, the packaging was secure and everything arrived in perfect shape. Installation was a breeze, the manual explained everything clearly, and setting it up was super smooth. Once it was up and running, I was impressed by how sleek and well-designed it looks—it actually fits right in with our home decor. The mapping process was super smart, too. The robot quickly created an accurate map of our house, easily detecting objects and adjusting to the layout. Plus, the app is really handy, you can specify where your furniture and carpets are, tweak the room layout, and customize all sorts of settings like water levels or suction strength. One extra bonus feature I love is that the app gives me access to the robot’s camera. With three pets at home, it’s actually super helpful. I can drive the robot around, see what my cats are up to, and just have a little extra peace of mind. As someone with three cats and a complex furniture setup, I’m honestly thrilled with how well it cleans. It leaves the floors shiny, and having separate bins for clean and dirty water makes me feel like it’s really hygienic. Overall, I think it’s a good robot, intelligent one, with lots of features. Hope that helps!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This robot vacuum and mop has made daily cleaning a lot easier. The suction is strong enough to pick up dust and hair from both hardwood floors and carpets, and the mop feature leaves the floor looking fresh without streaks. I like that it can adjust automatically when moving between floor types, so I don’t need to worry about it dragging water onto the carpet. The station is compact but does a lot: emptying, washing, and drying on its own, so I don’t have to spend much time on maintenance. The app is straightforward and lets me schedule cleaning or control it when I’m not at home. Voice control also works well for quick commands. It climbs over small transitions without getting stuck, which is helpful in my house. The battery recharges quickly, and it hasn’t died mid clean. Overall, it’s reliable, easy to use, and has reduced the effort I put into keeping the floors clean. I’m glad I decided to get it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Unfortunately it doesn't find it's own dock to be able to charge. After 6 hours of frustration, I'm ready to pack it up and send it back. It just roamed around the floors, running over everything it can. When I finally pushed it into the dock to charge because it couldn't find it's own home, it didn't charge. It told me it needed a firmware update. It couldn't do an update because it wasn't docked and charging required 20% battery. So now there is no option. I can't charge it or get it to find the dock. I think the robot maybe ok but I may have gotten a defective dock. I spoke with the customer service rep and followed all their steps (turning power on, plugging into another outlet, etc) but still no luck.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I’ve been using this robot vacuum and mop function for a little while now, and I have to say it’s a lifesaver. First off the design looks sleek and modern definitely something you don’t mind having out in the open. The cleaning performance is outstanding. It gets deep into corner pick up dust and pet hair easily and the mop function leaves my floor spotless. The mapping is very accurate, it never seems lost, and it navigates around furniture like a pro. Battery life is strong enough to cover my large house without constantly recharge and auto empty plus auto wash station make it truly hands free. It’s quit efficient and smart. I can control it right from my phone or with voice commands. Honestly it saves a lot of my times and efforts and my house feels clean than ever. If you’re on the fence, this is the one for you!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: The operation is very simple and user-friendly, with strong suction that easily cleans pet hair, cat litter, and other debris, and the noise is low, so even sensitive pets aren’t scared. It can be customized for different floor types, such as tiles, carpet, or wood, and cleans efficiently without missing spots. The mop washing and drying function is very convenient, eliminating the hassle of manual cleaning. Charging is fast, and it smartly remembers its cleaning progress, resuming automatically after recharging. Overall, the experience is extremely satisfying and highly recommended for any household.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Smart and efficient: All in one clean robot
top_reviews.review_comment: It’s super convenient! Previously I used two separate machines: one vacuum cleaner and one mop cleaner. Now I just need to use this one that has the dural functions! Besides, I needed to clean the mop cleaner manually since its self cleaning is not good and always causes smell. The self cleaning of this robot is great! I don’t need to manually clean it anymore! It can also detect whether it’s floor or carpet and then use different cleaning mode to clean them. It also has voice control function. That’s so cool! I can also control with an app. Cleaning house can be even done when I am out of home with app. There are lots of parameters can be tuned, for example strength of mopping and vacuuming. All in all, it saves a lot of time and cleans my home super clean. I strongly recommend it!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2025
